function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential violation of social distancing norms due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate pedestrian detection and distance calculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on public dataset for evaluation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of surveillance data for monitoring physical distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrusive alerting system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perspective transformation of video feed","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy in social distancing monitoring may not be acceptable for many individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases if social distancing measures are not effectively monitored","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on deep learning technology and pre-trained models for medical diagnosis and other critical tasks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data-driven approach development for covid-19 clustering algorithm","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decentralized iot-based system for regulating population flow during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing monitoring schemes using robots and surveillance technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Computer vision-based monitoring without privacy protection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis and deployment direction for social distancing monitoring approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of mass video surveillance system without clear ethical guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of video surveillance for monitoring crowded areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing through technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread if people gather in close proximity to study the schematics together.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of large image datasets may lead to privacy concerns and potential misuse of data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social media event analysis may lead to the spread of misinformation and panic in the population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass video surveillance may lead to concerns regarding the centralized collection and storage of sensitive data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass video surveillance for social distancing monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of individuals with disease symptoms through video surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time monitoring of physical contacts between individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of iot devices for data-driven services may increase the risk of contagion spread due to physical interaction with devices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on automated systems for targeted pandemic response may lead to errors in identifying and controlling contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of data-driven services and iot devices to cyber-attacks may compromise pandemic response and public health safety measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures at an early stage of the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly contagious virus with rapid global spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of precise and timely diagnosis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of approved therapy for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in construction industry due to lack of preventive measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial constraints in construction companies due to lack of spending on construction projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain disruptions due to lockdown restrictions impacting construction materials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in the delivery of construction materials due to lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in completion of construction project due to lockdown and other safety measure.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing as a major challenge.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction firms determining ideal projects actively pursuing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction companies adjusting schedule to avoid slowdown bottleneck","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant number of respondents in disagreement about construction companies improving office productivity and lowering overhead costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population of diploma and graduate education levels may lead to a higher likelihood of transmission due to increased social interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low number of respondents with phd level of education may result in a lack of expertise in public health and disease control within the construction workforce","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Majority agreement on the provision of health and safety rule signage and protective equipment may lead to a false sense of security and reduced vigilance against disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis involved 30 respondents for the questionnaire and five interviews, increasing the potential for disease transmission during data collection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Male respondents were found to be more than females in the research study, indicating potential gender-specific differences in disease exposure and susceptibility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data analysis involved close interaction with the respondents, increasing the risk of disease transmission during the research process.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gathering data from 30 participants may not be representative of the entire construction industry in the uk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using closed-ended questions and predetermined interview questions may limit the depth of data collected.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
